rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: He is very friendly and helpful. However, I felt like the class lacked substance. We basically just did our projects and that was about it. If the attendance was not mandatory, I don't think people would show up. This may be a better course to take over the summer, because it's really easy to learn the subject matter.

Chris is such a nice, laid back guy and he knows his stuff. He goes fast through the different Adobe programs (Photoshop, Illustrator). But you can get by not being an expert when doing the projects. There are 4 projects which he gives you lots of time in class to work on. Basically you can work at your own pace & spend class time how you want.
